name: Megacorp Mania - As part of The Dream Team
name_original: Megacorp Mania - As part of The Dream Team
description:
Megacorp Mania - As part of The Dream Team is a fighting game developed by TheAnonDcrest. It came out on 14-11-2018.
Megacorp Mania - As part of The Dream Team is available on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
